mapper.insert: insert into repayment_record(plan_id, payment_date, actual_amount) values(#{planId},#{paymentDate}, #{actualAmount})
mapper.select: select repayment_plan.application_id , product_type, installment, actual_amount, payment_date from generic_loan_application, repayment_plan, repayment_record where generic_loan_application.application_id = repayment_plan.application_id and repayment_plan.plan_id = repayment_record.plan_id and repayment_plan.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE repayment_record JOIN repayment_plan ON repayment_record.plan_id = repayment_plan.plan_id SET repayment_record.payment_date = #{date}, actual_amount = actual_amount*2 WHERE repayment_plan.plan_id = #{planId}
mapper.select: select plan_id from repayment_plan where application_id = #{applicationId}
